name: Design Sprint Template
description:
Are you planning a remote design sprint for a large group? Do you want to create break-out teams and empower them to work independently? Do you want to set clear expectations throughout the session? Try out this template.

We ran a remote design sprint for >15 people and had everyone work in break-out teams with this self-guided Figma file. Try it out, remix it, and help us make it better! @Ironclad
